ud4.1:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā cālikāyaṃ viharati cālike pabbate.
ud4.1:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā meghiyo bhagavato upaṭṭhāko hoti.
ud4.1:1.4: Atha kho āyasmā meghiyo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
ud4.1:1.5: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho āyasmā meghiyo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud4.1:2.1: Atha kho āyasmā meghiyo pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya jantugāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
ud4.1:2.2: Jantugāme piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīraṃ tenupasaṅkami.
ud4.1:2.3: Addasā kho āyasmā meghiyo kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīre jaṅghāvihāraṃ anucaṅkamamāno anuvicaramāno ambavanaṃ pāsādikaṃ manuññaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ.
ud4.1:2.7: Sace maṃ bhagavā anujāneyya, āgaccheyyāhaṃ imaṃ ambavanaṃ padhānāyā”ti.
ud4.1:3.1: Atha kho āyasmā meghiyo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
ud4.1:3.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā meghiyo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud4.1:4.1: “Idhāhaṃ, bhante, pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya jantugāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisiṃ.
ud4.1:4.2: Jantugāme piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīraṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃ.
ud4.1:4.3: Addasaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhante, kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīre jaṅghāvihāraṃ anucaṅkamamāno anuvicaramāno ambavanaṃ pāsādikaṃ manuññaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ.
ud4.1:4.7: Sace maṃ bhagavā anujāneyya, āgaccheyyāhaṃ imaṃ ambavanaṃ padhānāyā’ti.
ud4.1:4.8: Sace maṃ, bhante, bhagavā anujānāti, gaccheyyāhaṃ taṃ ambavanaṃ padhānāyā”ti.
ud4.1:5.1: Evaṃ vutte, bhagavā āyasmantaṃ meghiyaṃ etadavoca:
ud4.1:5.2: “āgamehi tāva, meghiya, ekakamhi tāva, yāva aññopi koci bhikkhu āgacchatī”ti.
ud4.1:6.1: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā meghiyo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud4.1:6.2: “bhagavato, bhante, natthi kiñci uttari karaṇīyaṃ, natthi katassa vā paticayo.
ud4.1:6.3: Mayhaṃ kho pana, bhante, atthi uttari karaṇīyaṃ, atthi katassa paticayo.
ud4.1:6.4: Sace maṃ bhagavā anujānāti, gaccheyyāhaṃ taṃ ambavanaṃ padhānāyā”ti.
ud4.1:6.5: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ meghiyaṃ etadavoca:
ud4.1:6.6: “āgamehi tāva, meghiya, ekakamhi tāva, yāva aññopi koci bhikkhu āgacchatī”ti.
ud4.1:7.1: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā meghiyo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud4.1:7.2: “bhagavato, bhante, natthi kiñci uttari karaṇīyaṃ, natthi katassa vā paticayo.
ud4.1:7.3: Mayhaṃ kho pana, bhante, atthi uttari karaṇīyaṃ, atthi katassa paticayo.
ud4.1:7.4: Sace maṃ bhagavā anujānāti, gaccheyyāhaṃ taṃ ambavanaṃ padhānāyā”ti.
ud4.1:8.1: Atha kho āyasmā meghiyo uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā yena taṃ ambavanaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ ambavanaṃ ajjhogāhetvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle divāvihāraṃ nisīdi.
ud4.1:8.2: Atha kho āyasmato meghiyassa tasmiṃ ambavane viharantassa yebhuyyena tayo pāpakā akusalā vitakkā samudācaranti, seyyathidaṃ—
ud4.1:9.3: Saddhāya ca vatamhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā.
ud4.1:9.4: Atha ca panimehi tīhi pāpakehi akusalehi vitakkehi anvāsattā, seyyathidaṃ—
ud4.1:10.1: Atha kho āyasmā meghiyo sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
ud4.1:10.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā meghiyo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud4.1:10.3: “idha mayhaṃ, bhante, tasmiṃ ambavane viharantassa yebhuyyena tayo pāpakā akusalā vitakkā samudācaranti, seyyathidaṃ—
ud4.1:10.7: Saddhāya ca vatamhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā.
ud4.1:10.8: Atha ca panimehi tīhi pāpakehi akusalehi vitakkehi anvāsattā, seyyathidaṃ—
ud4.1:11.1: “Aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā pañca dhammā paripākāya saṃvattanti.
ud4.1:12.1: Idha, meghiya, bhikkhu kalyāṇamitto hoti kalyāṇasahāyo kalyāṇasampavaṅko.
ud4.1:12.2: Aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā ayaṃ paṭhamo dhammo paripākāya saṃvattati.
ud4.1:13.1: Puna caparaṃ, meghiya, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti, pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno, aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
ud4.1:13.2: Aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā ayaṃ dutiyo dhammo paripākāya saṃvattati.
ud4.1:14.1: Puna caparaṃ, meghiya, bhikkhu yāyaṃ kathā abhisallekhikā cetovivaraṇasappāyā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati, seyyathidaṃ—
ud4.1:14.2: appicchakathā, santuṭṭhikathā, pavivekakathā, asaṃsaggakathā, vīriyārambhakathā, sīlakathā, samādhikathā, paññākathā, vimuttikathā, vimuttiñāṇadassanakathā;
ud4.1:14.3: evarūpāya kathāya nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
ud4.1:14.4: Aparipākāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā ayaṃ tatiyo dhammo paripākāya saṃvattati.
ud4.1:15.1: Puna caparaṃ, meghiya, bhikkhu āraddhavīriyo viharati, akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāya, thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
ud4.1:15.2: Aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā ayaṃ catuttho dhammo paripākāya saṃvattati.
ud4.1:16.1: Puna caparaṃ, meghiya, bhikkhu paññavā hoti udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
ud4.1:16.2: Aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā ayaṃ pañcamo dhammo paripākāya saṃvattati.
ud4.1:16.3: Aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā ime pañca dhammā paripākāya saṃvattanti.
ud4.1:17.1: Kalyāṇamittassetaṃ, meghiya, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṃ kalyāṇasahāyassa kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa yaṃ sīlavā bhavissati, pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharissati, ācāragocarasampanno, aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhissati sikkhāpadesu.
ud4.1:18.1: Kalyāṇamittassetaṃ, meghiya, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṃ kalyāṇasahāyassa kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa yaṃ yāyaṃ kathā abhisallekhikā cetovivaraṇasappāyā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati, seyyathidaṃ—
ud4.1:18.2: appicchakathā, santuṭṭhikathā, pavivekakathā, asaṃsaggakathā, vīriyārambhakathā, sīlakathā, samādhikathā, paññākathā, vimuttikathā, vimuttiñāṇadassanakathā;
ud4.1:18.3: evarūpāya kathāya nikāmalābhī bhavissati akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
ud4.1:19.1: Kalyāṇamittassetaṃ, meghiya, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṃ kalyāṇasahāyassa kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa yaṃ āraddhavīriyo viharissati akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāya, thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
ud4.1:20.1: Kalyāṇamittassetaṃ, meghiya, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṃ kalyāṇasahāyassa kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa yaṃ paññavā bhavissati, udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
ud4.1:21.1: Tena ca pana, meghiya, bhikkhunā imesu pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāya cattāro dhammā uttari bhāvetabbā—
ud4.1:21.2: asubhā bhāvetabbā rāgassa pahānāya, mettā bhāvetabbā byāpādassa pahānāya, ānāpānassati bhāvetabbā vitakkupacchedāya, aniccasaññā bhāvetabbā asmimānasamugghātāya.
ud4.1:21.3: Aniccasaññino hi, meghiya, anattasaññā saṇṭhāti, anattasaññī asmimānasamugghātaṃ pāpuṇāti diṭṭheva dhamme nibbānan”ti.
ud4.1:22.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
